description: A Qwik framework component implementing a simple to-do list with loader and action, including form handling, state management, and styling.

classes.name: ListItem
classes.description: Defines the shape of list items with a 'text' property.

methods.name: useListLoader
methods.description: Loader function that returns the current to-do list.

methods.name: useAddToListAction
methods.description: Action function to add a new item to the list after validation.
